stories.headline: Show HN: Moonshine Open-Weights STT models – higher accuracy than WhisperLargev3
Pi – a minimal terminal coding harness
How we rebuilt Next.js with AI in one week
Arvind KC appointed Chief People Officer
stories.summary: OpenAI appoints Arvind KC as Chief People Officer to help scale the company, strengthen its culture, and lead how work evolves in the age of AI.

stories.headline: Show HN: Emdash – Open-source agentic development environment
Why we no longer evaluate SWE-bench Verified
stories.summary: SWE-bench Verified is increasingly contaminated and mismeasures frontier coding progress. Our analysis shows flawed tests and training leakage. We recommend SWE-bench Pro.

stories.headline: Cell Service for the Fairly Paranoid
OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners
stories.summary: OpenAI announces Frontier Alliance Partners to help enterprises move from AI pilots to production with secure, scalable agent deployments.

stories.headline: Our First Proof submissions
stories.summary: We share our AI model’s proof attempts for the First Proof math challenge, testing research-grade reasoning on expert-level problems.

stories.headline: Dream Recorder AI – a portal to your subconscious
Advancing independent research on AI alignment
stories.summary: OpenAI commits $7.5M to The Alignment Project to fund independent AI alignment research, strengthening global efforts to address AGI safety and security risks.

stories.headline: IRS Tactics Against Meta Open a New Front in the Corporate Tax Fight
Apple rolls out age verification tools worldwide to comply with growing web of child safety laws
stories.summary: Apple complies with new age assurance laws in the U.S. and abroad, including those that block users from downloading apps aimed at adults.

stories.headline: Uber engineers built an AI version of their boss
stories.summary: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi said the company’s employees have gone all in on AI, going so far as to build a chatbot of him that they use to practice their pitches.

stories.headline: Former L3Harris Trenchant boss jailed for selling hacking tools to Russian broker
stories.summary: Peter Williams, the former head of U.S. hacking tools maker L3Harris Trenchant, was sentenced to seven years in prison for stealing and selling his former company’s hacking and surveillance tools to a

stories.headline: Google’s new 1.9GW clean energy deal includes massive 100-hour battery
stories.summary: Form Energy's iron-air batteries will store wind and solar power to keep the data center running 24/7.

stories.headline: CarGurus data breach affects 12.5 million accounts
stories.summary: Automotive marketplace CarGurus was the target of a data breach in which the names, email addresses, phone numbers, and physical addresses of millions of customers were stolen.
